snippet: An international tribunal handed down another indictment against a member of Hezbollah in the bombing that killed Rafik Hariri, the former Lebanese prime minister.
abstract: International court indicts Hassan Habib Merhi as fifth suspect in 2005 killing in Beirut of Rafik Hariri, former Lebanon prime minister; prosecutors say Merhi is a member of Hezbollah.
lead_paragraph: An international tribunal handed down another indictment against a member of Hezbollah in the bombing that killed Rafik Hariri, the former Lebanese prime minister.

headline.main: Fifth Suspect Is Indicted in 2005 Killing of Ex-Lebanese Premier
